11#ifndef P2P_BASE_TURN_SERVER_H_
12#define P2P_BASE_TURN_SERVER_H_
13
14#include <list>
15#include <map>
16#include <memory>
17#include <set>
18#include <string>
19#include <utility>
20#include <vector>
21
22#include "api/sequence_checker.h"
23#include "p2p/base/port_interface.h"
24#include "rtc_base/async_packet_socket.h"
25#include "rtc_base/socket_address.h"
26#include "rtc_base/third_party/sigslot/sigslot.h"
27#include "rtc_base/thread.h"
28
29namespace rtc {
30class ByteBufferWriter;
31class PacketSocketFactory;
32} // namespace rtc
33
34namespace cricket {
35
36class StunMessage;
37class TurnMessage;
38class TurnServer;
39
40// The default server port for TURN, as specified in RFC5766.
41const int TURN_SERVER_PORT = 3478;
42
43// Encapsulates the client's connection to the server.
44class TurnServerConnection {
45 public:
46 TurnServerConnection() : proto_(PROTO_UDP), socket_(NULL) {}
47 TurnServerConnection(const rtc::SocketAddress& src,
48 ProtocolType proto,
49 rtc::AsyncPacketSocket* socket);
50 const rtc::SocketAddress& src() const { return src_; }
51 rtc::AsyncPacketSocket* socket() { return socket_; }
52 bool operator==(const TurnServerConnection& t) const;
53 bool operator<(const TurnServerConnection& t) const;
54 std::string ToString() const;
55
56 private:
57 rtc::SocketAddress src_;
58 rtc::SocketAddress dst_;
59 cricket::ProtocolType proto_;
60 rtc::AsyncPacketSocket* socket_;
61};
62
63// Encapsulates a TURN allocation.
64// The object is created when an allocation request is received, and then
65// handles TURN messages (via HandleTurnMessage) and channel data messages
66// (via HandleChannelData) for this allocation when received by the server.
67// The object self-deletes and informs the server if its lifetime timer expires.
68class TurnServerAllocation : public rtc::MessageHandlerAutoCleanup,
69 public sigslot::has_slots<> {
70 public:
71 TurnServerAllocation(TurnServer* server_,
72 rtc::Thread* thread,
73 const TurnServerConnection& conn,
74 rtc::AsyncPacketSocket* server_socket,
75 const std::string& key);
76 ~TurnServerAllocation() override;
77
78 TurnServerConnection* conn() { return &conn_; }
79 const std::string& key() const { return key_; }
80 const std::string& transaction_id() const { return transaction_id_; }
81 const std::string& username() const { return username_; }
82 const std::string& origin() const { return origin_; }
83 const std::string& last_nonce() const { return last_nonce_; }
84 void set_last_nonce(const std::string& nonce) { last_nonce_ = nonce; }
85
86 std::string ToString() const;
87
88 void HandleTurnMessage(const TurnMessage* msg);
89 void HandleChannelData(const char* data, size_t size);
90
91 sigslot::signal1<TurnServerAllocation*> SignalDestroyed;
92
93 private:
94 class Channel;
95 class Permission;
96 typedef std::list<Permission*> PermissionList;
97 typedef std::list<Channel*> ChannelList;
98
99 void HandleAllocateRequest(const TurnMessage* msg);
100 void HandleRefreshRequest(const TurnMessage* msg);
101 void HandleSendIndication(const TurnMessage* msg);
102 void HandleCreatePermissionRequest(const TurnMessage* msg);
103 void HandleChannelBindRequest(const TurnMessage* msg);
104
105 void OnExternalPacket(rtc::AsyncPacketSocket* socket,
106 const char* data,
107 size_t size,
108 const rtc::SocketAddress& addr,
109 const int64_t& packet_time_us);
110
111 static int ComputeLifetime(const TurnMessage* msg);
112 bool HasPermission(const rtc::IPAddress& addr);
113 void AddPermission(const rtc::IPAddress& addr);
114 Permission* FindPermission(const rtc::IPAddress& addr) const;
115 Channel* FindChannel(int channel_id) const;
116 Channel* FindChannel(const rtc::SocketAddress& addr) const;
117
118 void SendResponse(TurnMessage* msg);
119 void SendBadRequestResponse(const TurnMessage* req);
120 void SendErrorResponse(const TurnMessage* req,
121 int code,
122 const std::string& reason);
123 void SendExternal(const void* data,
124 size_t size,
125 const rtc::SocketAddress& peer);
126
127 void OnPermissionDestroyed(Permission* perm);
128 void OnChannelDestroyed(Channel* channel);
129 void OnMessage(rtc::Message* msg) override;
130
131 TurnServer* const server_;
132 rtc::Thread* const thread_;
133 TurnServerConnection conn_;
134 std::unique_ptr<rtc::AsyncPacketSocket> external_socket_;
135 std::string key_;
136 std::string transaction_id_;
137 std::string username_;
138 std::string origin_;
139 std::string last_nonce_;
140 PermissionList perms_;
141 ChannelList channels_;
142};
143
144// An interface through which the MD5 credential hash can be retrieved.
145class TurnAuthInterface {
146 public:
147 // Gets HA1 for the specified user and realm.
148 // HA1 = MD5(A1) = MD5(username:realm:password).
149 // Return true if the given username and realm are valid, or false if not.
150 virtual bool GetKey(const std::string& username,
151 const std::string& realm,
152 std::string* key) = 0;
153 virtual ~TurnAuthInterface() = default;
154};
155
156// An interface enables Turn Server to control redirection behavior.
157class TurnRedirectInterface {
158 public:
159 virtual bool ShouldRedirect(const rtc::SocketAddress& address,
160 rtc::SocketAddress* out) = 0;
161 virtual ~TurnRedirectInterface() {}
162};
163
164class StunMessageObserver {
165 public:
166 virtual void ReceivedMessage(const TurnMessage* msg) = 0;
167 virtual void ReceivedChannelData(const char* data, size_t size) = 0;
168 virtual ~StunMessageObserver() {}
169};
170
171// The core TURN server class. Give it a socket to listen on via
172// AddInternalServerSocket, and a factory to create external sockets via
173// SetExternalSocketFactory, and it's ready to go.
174// Not yet wired up: TCP support.
175class TurnServer : public sigslot::has_slots<> {
176 public:
177 typedef std::map<TurnServerConnection, std::unique_ptr<TurnServerAllocation>>
178 AllocationMap;
179
180 explicit TurnServer(rtc::Thread* thread);
181 ~TurnServer() override;
182
183 // Gets/sets the realm value to use for the server.
184 const std::string& realm() const {
185 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(thread_);
186 return realm_;
187 }
188 void set_realm(const std::string& realm) {
189 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(thread_);
190 realm_ = realm;
191 }
192
193 // Gets/sets the value for the SOFTWARE attribute for TURN messages.
194 const std::string& software() const {
195 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(thread_);
196 return software_;
197 }
198 void set_software(const std::string& software) {
199 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(thread_);
200 software_ = software;
201 }
202
203 const AllocationMap& allocations() const {
204 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(thread_);
205 return allocations_;
206 }
207
208 // Sets the authentication callback; does not take ownership.
209 void set_auth_hook(TurnAuthInterface* auth_hook) {
210 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(thread_);
211 auth_hook_ = auth_hook;
212 }
213
214 void set_redirect_hook(TurnRedirectInterface* redirect_hook) {
215 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(thread_);
216 redirect_hook_ = redirect_hook;
217 }
218
219 void set_enable_otu_nonce(bool enable) {
220 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(thread_);
221 enable_otu_nonce_ = enable;
222 }
223
224 // If set to true, reject CreatePermission requests to RFC1918 addresses.
225 void set_reject_private_addresses(bool filter) {
226 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(thread_);
227 reject_private_addresses_ = filter;
228 }
229
230 void set_enable_permission_checks(bool enable) {
231 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(thread_);
232 enable_permission_checks_ = enable;
233 }
234
235 // Starts listening for packets from internal clients.
236 void AddInternalSocket(rtc::AsyncPacketSocket* socket, ProtocolType proto);
237 // Starts listening for the connections on this socket. When someone tries
238 // to connect, the connection will be accepted and a new internal socket
239 // will be added.
240 void AddInternalServerSocket(rtc::AsyncSocket* socket, ProtocolType proto);
241 // Specifies the factory to use for creating external sockets.
242 void SetExternalSocketFactory(rtc::PacketSocketFactory* factory,
243 const rtc::SocketAddress& address);
244 // For testing only.
245 std::string SetTimestampForNextNonce(int64_t timestamp) {
246 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(thread_);
247 ts_for_next_nonce_ = timestamp;
248 return GenerateNonce(timestamp);
249 }
250
251 void SetStunMessageObserver(std::unique_ptr<StunMessageObserver> observer) {
252 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(thread_);
253 stun_message_observer_ = std::move(observer);
254 }
255
256 private:
257 // All private member functions and variables should have access restricted to
258 // thread_. But compile-time annotations are missing for members access from
259 // TurnServerAllocation (via friend declaration), and the On* methods, which
260 // are called via sigslot.
261 std::string GenerateNonce(int64_t now) const RTC_RUN_ON(thread_);
262 void OnInternalPacket(rtc::AsyncPacketSocket* socket,
263 const char* data,
264 size_t size,
265 const rtc::SocketAddress& address,
266 const int64_t& packet_time_us);
267
268 void OnNewInternalConnection(rtc::AsyncSocket* socket);
269
270 // Accept connections on this server socket.
271 void AcceptConnection(rtc::AsyncSocket* server_socket) RTC_RUN_ON(thread_);
272 void OnInternalSocketClose(rtc::AsyncPacketSocket* socket, int err);
273
274 void HandleStunMessage(TurnServerConnection* conn,
275 const char* data,
276 size_t size) RTC_RUN_ON(thread_);
277 void HandleBindingRequest(TurnServerConnection* conn, const StunMessage* msg)
278 RTC_RUN_ON(thread_);
279 void HandleAllocateRequest(TurnServerConnection* conn,
280 const TurnMessage* msg,
281 const std::string& key) RTC_RUN_ON(thread_);
282
283 bool GetKey(const StunMessage* msg, std::string* key) RTC_RUN_ON(thread_);
284 bool CheckAuthorization(TurnServerConnection* conn,
285 StunMessage* msg,
286 const char* data,
287 size_t size,
288 const std::string& key) RTC_RUN_ON(thread_);
289 bool ValidateNonce(const std::string& nonce) const RTC_RUN_ON(thread_);
290
291 TurnServerAllocation* FindAllocation(TurnServerConnection* conn)
292 RTC_RUN_ON(thread_);
293 TurnServerAllocation* CreateAllocation(TurnServerConnection* conn,
294 int proto,
295 const std::string& key)
296 RTC_RUN_ON(thread_);
297
298 void SendErrorResponse(TurnServerConnection* conn,
299 const StunMessage* req,
300 int code,
301 const std::string& reason);
302
303 void SendErrorResponseWithRealmAndNonce(TurnServerConnection* conn,
304 const StunMessage* req,
305 int code,
306 const std::string& reason)
307 RTC_RUN_ON(thread_);
308
309 void SendErrorResponseWithAlternateServer(TurnServerConnection* conn,
310 const StunMessage* req,
311 const rtc::SocketAddress& addr)
312 RTC_RUN_ON(thread_);
313
314 void SendStun(TurnServerConnection* conn, StunMessage* msg);
315 void Send(TurnServerConnection* conn, const rtc::ByteBufferWriter& buf);
316
317 void OnAllocationDestroyed(TurnServerAllocation* allocation)
318 RTC_RUN_ON(thread_);
319 void DestroyInternalSocket(rtc::AsyncPacketSocket* socket)
320 RTC_RUN_ON(thread_);
321
322 typedef std::map<rtc::AsyncPacketSocket*, ProtocolType> InternalSocketMap;
323 typedef std::map<rtc::AsyncSocket*, ProtocolType> ServerSocketMap;
324
325 rtc::Thread* const thread_;
326 const std::string nonce_key_;
327 std::string realm_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(thread_);
328 std::string software_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(thread_);
329 TurnAuthInterface* auth_hook_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(thread_);
330 TurnRedirectInterface* redirect_hook_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(thread_);
331 // otu - one-time-use. Server will respond with 438 if it's
332 // sees the same nonce in next transaction.
333 bool enable_otu_nonce_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(thread_);
334 bool reject_private_addresses_ = false;
335 // Check for permission when receiving an external packet.
336 bool enable_permission_checks_ = true;
337
338 InternalSocketMap server_sockets_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(thread_);
339 ServerSocketMap server_listen_sockets_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(thread_);
340 std::unique_ptr<rtc::PacketSocketFactory> external_socket_factory_
341 RTC_GUARDED_BY(thread_);
342 rtc::SocketAddress external_addr_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(thread_);
343
344 AllocationMap allocations_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(thread_);
345
346 // For testing only. If this is non-zero, the next NONCE will be generated
347 // from this value, and it will be reset to 0 after generating the NONCE.
348 int64_t ts_for_next_nonce_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(thread_) = 0;
349
350 // For testing only. Used to observe STUN messages received.
351 std::unique_ptr<StunMessageObserver> stun_message_observer_
352 RTC_GUARDED_BY(thread_);
353
354 friend class TurnServerAllocation;
355};
356
357} // namespace cricket
358
359#endif // P2P_BASE_TURN_SERVER_H_
360
